N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 27.3 - Registration procedures

State Regulations
(a) On and after October 1, 1985, no
registration or renewal of a registration for a heavy vehicle shall be issued
unless proof of payment of, or exemption from, the heavy vehicle use tax is
submitted to the commissioner in conjunction with the application for
registration or renewal of registration. (b) Such proof shall not be required if the
application for registration is presented within 60 days of the acquisition of
the heavy vehicle being registered. (c) Notwithstanding the provisions of
subdivision (a) of this section, an issuing office may manually extend expiring
registrations for a period not to exceed 90 days to allow registrants time to
provide the proof required by such subdivision. (d) With respect to an agricultural vehicle
or a truck used in logging, upon the submission of a properly completed
declaration of exempt status (Form MV-3HV), with an application for
registration or renewal of registration, the registration for such vehicle will
be a registration as an agricultural vehicle or a truck used in logging, whichever is appropriate. Notes
